tcm_face_correlations.description: Integration between Traditional Chinese Face Reading and Traditional Chinese Medicine for comprehensive health and consciousness analysis
tcm_face_correlations.foundation: Both systems share the same Five Elements theory and organ system correlations

integration_insights: Wood constitutional types need liver support during stress
Spring season affects Wood facial features most strongly
Eye brightness reflects heart health and circulation
Fire constitutional types need heart calming during summer
Midday hours most affect Fire facial characteristics
Earth constitutional types need digestive support during worry
Late summer affects Earth facial features significantly
Nose quality reflects lung-large intestine health
Metal constitutional types need respiratory support in autumn
Afternoon hours most affect Metal facial characteristics
Water constitutional types need kidney support in winter
Evening hours most affect Water facial characteristics

stomach_meridian.facial_correlation: Affects overall facial muscle tone and digestive appearance
stomach_meridian.health_indicators: Facial muscle strength, jaw function, digestive health

large_intestine_meridian.facial_correlation: Affects nose area and elimination function appearance
large_intestine_meridian.health_indicators: Nasal health, skin clarity, elimination function

small_intestine_meridian.facial_correlation: Affects ear and eye corner areas

bladder_meridian.facial_correlation: Affects inner eye area and forehead
bladder_meridian.health_indicators: Eye health, urinary function, nervous system

gallbladder_meridian.health_indicators: Decision making, bile function, side head tension

triple_heater_meridian.facial_correlation: Affects ear and outer eye areas

wood_constitution.optimal_timing: Spring season, 3am-7am, wood hours for treatments

fire_constitution.optimal_timing: Summer season, 11am-3pm, fire hours for treatments

health_recommendations: Regular meal times for earth stability
earth_constitution.optimal_timing: Late summer, 7am-11am, earth hours for treatments

metal_constitution.optimal_timing: Autumn season, 3pm-7pm, metal hours for treatments

health_recommendations: Rest and recovery for jing preservation
water_constitution.optimal_timing: Winter season, 7pm-11pm, water hours for treatments

tongue_face_correlation.tongue_body: Reflects overall constitutional type seen in facial structure
tongue_face_correlation.tongue_coating: Correlates with facial skin quality and clarity
tongue_face_correlation.tongue_color: Matches facial color and circulation indicators
tongue_face_correlation.tongue_moisture: Corresponds to facial hydration and luster

pulse_face_correlation.pulse_strength: Correlates with facial bone structure and definition
pulse_face_correlation.pulse_quality: Reflects facial vitality and energy expression
pulse_face_correlation.pulse_position: Corresponds to facial regional health indicators

five_colors.green: Wood imbalance, liver issues, eyebrow area affected
five_colors.red: Fire excess, heart issues, eye area affected
five_colors.yellow: Earth imbalance, spleen issues, cheek area affected
five_colors.white: Metal deficiency, lung issues, nose area affected
five_colors.black: Water depletion, kidney issues, chin area affected

seasonal_optimization.spring: Focus on Wood constitution and liver-gallbladder support
seasonal_optimization.summer: Emphasize Fire constitution and heart-small intestine balance
seasonal_optimization.late_summer: Support Earth constitution and spleen-stomach function
seasonal_optimization.autumn: Strengthen Metal constitution and lung-large intestine health
seasonal_optimization.winter: Tonify Water constitution and kidney-bladder vitality
